title: The Diamond, the Painting, and the Great Actress

infobox.Title:: The Diamond, the Painting, and the Great Actress
infobox.Japanese title:: ダイヤと絵画と大女優  (Daiya to Kaiga to Dai Joyū)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ran Mouri  Kogoro Mouri  Kira Miyahara
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Yoshiko Okamoto as Misuzu Shirakawa  Anri Katsu as Kyousuke Shirakawa  Ayako Kawasumi as Chiharu Shirakawa  Fujiko Takimoto as Saori Shirakawa  Mariko Kouda as Yuuka Nakanishi  Hikaru Hanada as Detective Tamagawa

sections.Situation: Kogoro, Ran, and Conan are watching the ending of an old movie staring retired actress Misuzu Shirakawa at her home. As the trio tour the home with the actress, her three children, and the maid, they are surprised to witness consistent quarreling in the household with Misuzu Shirakawa being the unpleasant one. As the afternoon draws close, the actress retires to her bedroom for an afternoon nap. Soon after, a car accident occurs outside, and then smoke emerges from the bedroom.
sections.People:
- Victim (smoke inhalation)
- 58 years old
- Actress
- 23 years old
- Misuzu's first son
- 22 years old
- Misuzu's second daughter
- 21 years old
- Misuzu's third daughter
- 22 years old
- Housekeeper
- 35 years old
- Tokyo Police Arson Division detective
sections.Trivia:
- The Conan News ticker at the bottom at the end of this episode was talking about the deaths of two of the voice actors: Seizo Kato who voiced Kiyonaga Matsumoto, and Ichiro Nagai who voiced Jirokichi Suzuki. Both passed away in January 2014, only ten days apart from each other.
- The painting at the beginning is about the château demolished in The Secret of the Vanished Masterpiece. Open spoiler box to see images.
- Yuuka Nakanishi's car is a 1991 gray Toyota Crown [S140]. The license plate number is 新宿 300, な 16-73 (Shinjuju 300, Na 16-73).
- The off-road is a 2009 white Mitsubishi Pajero Mini [H58A]. The license plate number is 新宿 530, な 80-10 (Shinjuju 530, Na 80-10).
